<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Shadow](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3186)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The mysterious undead known as shadows lurk in dark places and feed on those who stray too far from the light.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Shadow.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Shadow](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3186)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Incorporeal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=632" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=722" />
<trait label="Unholy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=521" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 306 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +10; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +14

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -5

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** -2

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +3
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +12 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 40
([void healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=83))

</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), precision, [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95)

**Resistances**
all 5 (except [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=610), [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2840), [spirit](/Traits.aspx?ID=737), or [vitality](/Traits.aspx?ID=509); double resistance vs. non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103))

**Weaknesses**
light vulnerability

**Light Vulnerability** Attacks against the shadow are treated as [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644) if made by a creature who is in magical light or with an object that is in magical light (such as from the [_light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1585) spell).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shadow hand +15 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d6+3 void

**Shadow Spawn**   When a creature's shadow is pulled free by Steal Shadow, it becomes a shadow spawn under the command of the shadow that created it. This shadow spawn doesn't have Steal Shadow and is perpetually and incurably [clumsy 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=61). If the creature the shadow spawn was pulled from dies, the shadow spawn becomes a full-fledged, autonomous shadow. If the creature recovers from its enfeeblement, its shadow returns to it and the shadow spawn is extinguished.

**Slink in Shadows**   The shadow can [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=2404) or end its [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=2405) in a creature's or object's shadow.

**Steal Shadow** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) **Requirements** The shadow hit a living creature with a shadow hand Strike on its previous action; **Effect** The shadow pulls at the target's shadow, making the creature [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=71). This is cumulative with other enfeebled conditions from shadows, to a maximum of enfeebled 4. If this increases a creature's enfeebled value to 3 or more, the target's shadow is separated from its body (see shadow spawn). The enfeebled value from Steal Shadow decreases by 1 every hour.

</column>
